review.title: “Blue Ridge XRay”
review.pros: Pros – Hire older reps. Company car.
review.cons: Cons – Poor pay, poor communication, few benefits, no rewards or written accolades. Management has little knowledge of what is really going on with it's own core business. Sales team is not a team as sales managers undermine each other and take credit and commissions from sales reps that earned it. Manufacturers are not represented fairly.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat people as you want to be treated, adjust wages, rewards to match industry norms.
